    • Uses of Abortable in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

      Subinterfaces of Abortable in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Admin
      The administrative API for HBase.
      interface  Connection
      A cluster connection encapsulating lower level individual connections to actual servers and a connection to zookeeper.
      interface  Hbck
      Hbck fixup tool APIs.
      Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client that implement Abortable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  AdminOverAsyncAdmin
      The Admin implementation which is based on an AsyncAdmin.
      (package private) class  ConnectionOverAsyncConnection
      The connection implementation based on AsyncConnection.
      class  HBaseHbck
      Use Connection.getHbck() to obtain an instance of Hbck instead of constructing an HBaseHbck directly.
      class  SharedConnection
      Wraps a Connection to make it can't be closed or aborted.
